com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.annotation

Class CircleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.annotation.AnnotationManager<Circle,CircleOptions,OnCircleClickListener,OnCircleLongClickListener>
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.plugins.annotation.CircleManager

  • public class CircleManager
extends AnnotationManager<Circle,CircleOptions,OnCircleClickListener,OnCircleLongClickListener>
    The circle manager allows to add circles to a map.

      • CircleManager

        public CircleManager(MapboxMap mapboxMap,
                     GeoJsonSource geoJsonSource,
                     CircleLayer layer,
                     String belowLayerId)
        Create a circle manager, used to manage circles.
        Parameters:
        mapboxMap - the map object to add circles to
        geoJsonSource - the geojson source to add circles to
        layer - the circle layer to visualise Circles with
